verses.verse: הֶן־ <WH2005> Behold כֹּ֭ל <WH3605> all רָאֲתָ֣ה <WH7200> hath seen עֵינִ֑י <WH5869> Lo mine eye שָֽׁמְעָ֥ה <WH8085> hath heard אָ֝זְנִ֗י <WH241> all [this] mine ear וַתָּ֥בֶן <WH995> and understood לָֽהּ׃

כְּֽ֭דַעְתְּכֶם <WH1847> What ye know יָדַ֣עְתִּי <WH3045> [the same] do I know גַם־ <WH1571> also אָ֑נִי <WH589> I לֹא־ <WH3808> I am not נֹפֵ֖ל <WH5307> also I [am] not inferior אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I מִכֶּֽם׃ <WH4480> at

אוּלָ֗ם <WH199> Surely אֲ֭נִי <WH589> I אֶל־ <WH413> to שַׁדַּ֣י <WH7706> to the Almighty אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> I would speak וְהוֹכֵ֖חַ <WH3198> to reason אֶל־ <WH413> with אֵ֣ל <WH410> with God אֶחְפָּֽץ׃ <WH2654> and I desire

וְֽאוּלָ֗ם <WH199> But אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you טֹֽפְלֵי־ <WH2950> ye [are] forgers שָׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> of lies רֹפְאֵ֖י <WH7495> ye [are] all physicians אֱלִ֣ל <WH457> of no value כֻּלְּכֶֽם׃ <WH3605> are all

מִֽי־ <WH4310> O יִ֭תֵּן <WH5414> O that הַחֲרֵ֣שׁ <WH2790> ye would altogether תַּחֲרִישׁ֑וּן <WH2790> hold your peace וּתְהִ֖י <WH1961> become לָכֶ֣ם לְחָכְמָֽה׃ <WH2451> and it should be your wisdom
שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> Hear נָ֥א <WH4994> Please תוֹכַחְתִּ֑י <WH8433> now my reasoning וְרִב֖וֹת <WH7379> to the pleadings שְׂפָתַ֣י <WH8193> of my lips הַקְשִֽׁיבוּ׃ <WH7181> and hearken
הַ֭לְאֵל <WH410> God תְּדַבְּר֣וּ <WH1696> Will ye speak עַוְלָ֑ה <WH5766> wickedly וְ֝ל֗וֹ תְּֽדַבְּר֥וּ <WH1696> and speak רְמִיָּֽה׃ <WH7423> deceitfully
הֲפָנָ֥יו <WH6440> accept תִּשָּׂא֑וּן <WH5375> Will ye accept אִם־ <WH518> lo לָאֵ֥ל <WH410> God תְּרִיבֽוּן׃ <WH7378> contend

הֲ֭טוֹב <WH2896> will it be well כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when יַחְקֹ֣ר <WH2713> that he should search you out אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> אִם־ <WH518> Or כְּהָתֵ֥ל <WH2048> mocketh בֶּ֝אֱנ֗וֹשׁ <WH376> another תְּהָתֵ֥לּוּ <WH2048> another do ye [so] mock בֽוֹ׃
הוֹכֵ֣חַ <WH3198> He will surely יוֹכִ֣יחַ <WH3198> reprove אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> אִם־ <WH518> If בַּ֝סֵּ֗תֶר <WH5643> you if ye do secretly פָּנִ֥ים <WH6440> persons תִּשָּׂאֽוּן׃ <WH5375> accept

הֲלֹ֣א <WH3808> will not שְׂ֭אֵתוֹ <WH7613> Shall not his excellency תְּבַעֵ֣ת <WH1204> make you afraid אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> וּ֝פַחְדּ֗וֹ <WH6343> ? and his dread יִפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> fall עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5921> and
זִֽ֭כְרֹנֵיכֶם <WH2146> Your remembrances מִשְׁלֵי־ <WH4911> be like אֵ֑פֶר <WH665> unto ashes לְגַבֵּי־ <WH1354> your bodies חֹ֝֗מֶר <WH2563> of clay גַּבֵּיכֶֽם׃ <WH1354> to bodies

הַחֲרִ֣ישׁוּ <WH2790> Hold your peace מִ֭מֶּנִּי <WH4480> before וַאֲדַבְּרָה־ <WH1696> let me alone that I may speak אָ֑נִי <WH589> Then וְיַעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> and let come עָלַ֣י <WH5921> on מָֽה׃ <WH4100> what

עַל־ <WH5921> and מָ֤ה ׀ <WH4100> I אֶשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> Wherefore do I take בְשָׂרִ֣י <WH1320> my flesh בְשִׁנָּ֑י <WH8127> in my teeth וְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> my life אָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> and put בְּכַפִּֽי׃ <WH3709> branch

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Though יִ֭קְטְלֵנִי <WH6991> he slay [לֹא כ] (לֹ֣ו <WH3808> not ק) אֲיַחֵ֑ל <WH3176> me yet will I trust אַךְ־ <WH389> Nevertheless דְּ֝רָכַ֗י <WH1870> mine own ways אֶל־ <WH413> about פָּנָ֥יו <WH6440> before אוֹכִֽיחַ׃ <WH3198> in him but I will maintain גַּם־ <WH1571> again הוּא־ <WH1931> he
לִ֥י לִֽישׁוּעָ֑ה <WH3444> He also [shall be] my salvation כִּי־ <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> before לְ֝פָנָ֗יו <WH6440> before חָנֵ֥ף <WH2611> for an hypocrite יָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> shall not come
שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> Hear שָׁ֭מוֹעַ <WH8085> diligently מִלָּתִ֑י <WH4405> my speech וְ֝אַֽחֲוָתִ֗י <WH262> and my declaration בְּאָזְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH241> with your ears

הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold נָ֭א <WH4994> now עָרַ֣כְתִּי <WH6186> Behold now I have ordered מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> [my] cause יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי <WH3045> I know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I אֶצְדָּֽק׃ <WH6663> that I shall be justified

מִי־ <WH4310> Who ה֭וּא <WH1931> he יָרִ֣יב <WH7378> Who [is] he [that] will plead עִמָּדִ֑י <WH5978> against כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> then אַחֲרִ֣ישׁ <WH2790> with me? for now if I hold my tongue וְאֶגְוָֽע׃ <WH1478> I shall give up the ghost

אַךְ־ <WH389> Only שְׁ֭תַּיִם <WH8147> not two אַל־ <WH410> God תַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> Only do עִמָּדִ֑י <WH5978> to me אָ֥ז <WH227> Then מִ֝פָּנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> myself from thee לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֶסָּתֵֽר׃ <WH5641> [things] unto me then will I not hide
כַּ֭פְּךָ <WH3709> thine hand מֵעָלַ֣י <WH5921> and הַרְחַ֑ק <WH7368> far וְ֝אֵ֥מָתְךָ֗ <WH367> from me and let not thy dread אַֽל־ <WH408> nay תְּבַעֲתַֽנִּי׃ <WH1204> make me afraid
וּ֭קְרָא <WH7121> Then call וְאָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> and I אֶֽעֱנֶ֑ה <WH6030> thou and I will answer אֽוֹ־ <WH176> Or אֲ֝דַבֵּ֗ר <WH1696> or let me speak וַהֲשִׁיבֵֽנִי׃ <WH7725> and answer

כַּמָּ֣ה <WH4100> How לִ֭י עֲוֹנ֣וֹת <WH5771> How many [are] mine iniquities וְחַטָּא֑וֹת <WH2403> and my sin פִּֽשְׁעִ֥י <WH6588> my transgression וְ֝חַטָּאתִ֗י <WH2403> and my sin הֹדִיעֵֽנִי׃ <WH3045> known
לָֽמָּה־ <WH4100> Why פָנֶ֥יךָ <WH6440> thou thy face תַסְתִּ֑יר <WH5641> Wherefore hidest וְתַחְשְׁבֵ֖נִי <WH2803> and holdest לְאוֹיֵ֣ב <WH341> me for thine enemy לָֽךְ׃

הֶעָלֶ֣ה <WH5929> a leaf נִדָּ֣ף <WH5086> driven to and fro תַּעֲר֑וֹץ <WH6206> Wilt thou break וְאֶת־ <WH853> קַ֖שׁ <WH7179> stubble יָבֵ֣שׁ <WH3002> the dry תִּרְדֹּֽף׃ <WH7291> ? and wilt thou pursue

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תִכְתֹּ֣ב <WH3789> For thou writest עָלַ֣י <WH5921> against מְרֹר֑וֹת <WH4846> bitter things וְ֝תוֹרִישֵׁ֗נִי <WH3423> against me and makest me to possess עֲוֹנ֥וֹת <WH5771> the iniquities נְעוּרָֽי׃ <WH5271> of my youth

וְתָ֘שֵׂ֤ם <WH7760> Thou puttest בַּסַּ֨ד ׀ <WH5465> also in the stocks רַגְלַ֗י <WH7272> my feet וְתִשְׁמ֥וֹר <WH8104> and lookest narrowly כָּל־ <WH3605> all אָרְחוֹתָ֑י <WH734> unto all my paths עַל־ <WH5921> for שָׁרְשֵׁ֥י <WH8328> upon the heels רַ֝גְלַ֗י <WH7272> of my feet תִּתְחַקֶּֽה׃ <WH2707> thou settest a print
וְ֭הוּא <WH1931> he כְּרָקָ֣ב <WH7538> And he as a rotten thing יִבְלֶ֑ה <WH1086> consumeth כְּ֝בֶ֗גֶד <WH899> as a garment אֲכָ֣לוֹ <WH398> eaten עָֽשׁ׃ <WH6211> that is moth
